steps: Open Microsoft Word and load the Document11.docx file.
Click on the 'File' tab in the top left corner of the window.
In the Word Options dialog box, click on 'Proofing' in the left sidebar.
In the AutoCorrect dialog box, you will see various tabs for different types of auto-corrections.
Navigate to the desired tab (e.g., 'AutoFormat As You Type', 'AutoFormat', 'AutoCorrect', etc.) based on the type of auto-correction you want to modify.
Make the necessary changes to the auto-correction options on the selected tab.
Click 'OK' to save the changes and close the AutoCorrect dialog box.
Click 'OK' again to close the Word Options dialog box.
You have successfully changed the AutoCorrect options in Document11.docx.
